attributes.action: Communist party terrorism tortures going on 17 years!
attributes.additional_details: I’m Iranian British and Communist party terrorism which based in Russia, China, and... torturing me by nuclear electromagnetic, microwave weapons 17 years! On my last petition you said: I’m joking!? It’s big lye by you! You support Communist party tortures! USA governments shoot down and my tortures worse! Where are human rights in this country! This is anti humanity, Russian, Indian Chinese, and African, torturing me here!? Local police and NHS are my torturers! I need you to stop them! M Tahani
